dict.acceptation: 判断，鉴定；辨别力，判断力；意见，看法；判决书；

sent.orig: Factual judgment and value judgment respectively involve two kinds of domains of educational research.
sent.trans: 事实判断和价值判断分别指涉教育研究中两种不同的研究领域。

sent.orig: Good judgment comes from experience. Unfortunately, the experience usually comes from bad judgment.
sent.trans: 好的判断来自经验。但是很不幸的，经验通常是来自坏的判断。

sent.orig: Last, the author discusses the relationship between judgment for conductingagain and judgment for performance.
sent.trans: 最后，本文对重作判决和履行判决的关系进行了梳理。

sent.orig: If a judgment is obtained, the student must application within two years of the final judgment.
sent.trans: 如果是因为法院判决，则须在最后判决两年内提交申请。

sent.orig: For the judgment is merciless to one who has not shown mercy; mercy triumphs over judgment.
sent.trans: 因为对不行怜悯的人，审判时也没有怜悯；怜悯必得胜审判。
